desc: Project OverviewSeeking a Freelancer to develop unique product and service description content around IBM/AWS services as well as a separate startup incubation network.Project DescriptionContent created is not to be a simple copy/paste from other sites.  Looking for creative unique genuine authentic content that is inspired by below milestone requirements:20% Milestone 1 - You may base content on all IBM/AWS service(s) currently available; rebranding said content into a unique proposition.Will you be pasting unique affiliate content into Wordpress pages, highlighting which services are coming soon and which ones are presently available based on your analysis of integrated platforms in play?20% Milestone 2 - content for a startup incubator.Will you be pasting unique affiliate content into Wordpress pages, highlighting which services are coming soon and which ones are presently available based on your analysis of platforms in play?20% Milestone 3 - Bonus affiliate content enhancements, requirements or edits related to above. What notes can we hand over to a design shop to further build visual UI elements related to content pages?- pause in work -10% Milestone 510% Milestone 5 - Bonus IaaS Content Revision Phase10% Milestone 6 - Bonus Startup Incubator Content Revision Phase10% Milestone 7 - Bonus Further DevOps Requirements Revision Phase10% Milestone 8 - Bonus Handover project delivery BAU well done.Required ExperienceTo be best fit for this project, you will need the following skills:Ability to communicate clearly and vividlyDedication to meet project deadlines in a timely manner; include your concrete timelines of specifications for deliverables in your proposalWrite I am a human on top of your proposalAttention to detailHere are the primary questions that I hope you can address in your proposal:How are you able to meet your estimated timeline?  How is this timeline realistic?Please describe your project management skills.  What’s your approach to juggling multiple projects?In your opinion, what are the three core skills needed for this project?Of the three, which would you describe as your strongest skill? Your weakest?Can I see your portfolio or samples of your work?Can you describe your approach to this project?Final Deliverables:Presentation deck of content w/ links to Wordpress / Platform updates.Any supplemental materials included in a zip fileAny additional helpful links and style references

desc: Customer experience consulting firm, [url removed, login to view] led by the number one best-selling author on the subject of customer experience is looking to drive client growth. Correspondingly, we are looking for a US-based marketing assistant to identify potential clients and to engage them by phone and email in order to set up sales appointments with our CEO. The marketing assistant would also post content on our LinkedIn, Twitter and Google Plus page each day. Our firm provides customer experience consultants, mystery shopping, retail and hospitality audits, customer experience strategies, customer experience leadership training and customer service team training. The freelancer must be willing to have quick daily phone calls to discuss progress and to deliver results in terms of qualified leads. The initial test is for a period of 30 days and our budget is $1000 for the test. After the test is completed, we can review the economic benefit of the freelancer and determine if moving to a higher level of 2-3K plus incentives is appropriate. Freelancers must be located in the continental United States (no exceptions) and must be willing to communicate by phone and must deliver four – six qualified leads per week.

desc: Hello,I am looking for an SEO expert to analyze my company's website created in WP and compare with our four competitors' sites. I would like to know, some key metrics around how each site is performing, including average unique visitors per month over the last six months; average time on site; the number of pages visited etc. Guaranteed results required.The job involves the following:#   Website Structure and  Navigation Analysis#   Current Keyword Analysis and Research#   Improvement of Page Title#   Improvement of Page Descriptions#   Specifying the Canonical Tags#   Improvement of ALT Tags#   Content  Rewriting with the targeted keywords#   Header Tags (H1, H2, H3) Optimization [Wherever Required] Webmaster Tools Setup & Configuration (If not done already) Google Webmaster Tools &  Bing Webmaster Tools will   be setup  and Configured.#   Check  the current setup of  Google Analytics#   Search Engine Submissions#   Site Map Creation and Submission#   [url removed, login to view] File checkingWould like to your ideas /plans on:#   Audit and Analysis of SEO Techniques#   SEO Campaign Development#   SEO Campaign Launch#   SEO Campaign Management and OptimizationThe Job also includes:o	Updating the websiteo	Update the WP version in the website based on the updates in WPo	Update the plug-in used in the website to the latest versions.o	Update the PHP version on the website available in the servero	Few other website update/s may be required, the details will be given as and when the update is required.o	Monthly backup to taken and emailed to us.Honest, trust worthy person committed to working on long term basis. This is a 1-year contract, only serious, only a committed person should apply. The estimated budget is around INR 12,000/-Those interested kindly apply with a full proposal with previous work done.Regards,Rajiv
title: SEO FOR Website
